page.title: UID Providers for Annotations
page.introduction: The Annotations Properties Pane accepts input of unique identifiers from a set of providers depending on the model element selected.
page.appearance:
All elements accept UIDs from
PubMed
DOI
Models also accept UIDs from
BioModels Database
Reactome
NeuronDB
MOdelDB at SenseLab
Structures also accept UIDS from
Brenda
Gene Ontology
Species and Molecules also accept UIDs from
ChEBI
KEGG Compound
UniProt
Enzyme Nomenclature
Gene Ontology
Reactome
Reactions also accept UIDs from
KEGG Pathway
KEGG Reaction
Reactome
Brenda
IntAct
Additional UIDs are supported only when associated with imported models (e.g. from BioModels Database), including
InterPro
Enzyme Nomenclature
Ensembl
KEGG Orthology
KEGG Reaction
Taxonomy
ICD
Mamo
PubChem Compound
Teddy
PubChem Substance
Doid
Omim
3Dmet
Cell Ontology
Cas
BTO
Pato
Pw
Mod
Fma
Pr
SBO
